titles.title: To extend and revise the temporary suspension of duty on Biaxially oriented polypropylene dielectric film.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/12/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2011, the duty on biaxially oriented polypropylene dielectric film.
